availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: William Oden (Nicholas County Farmer, Lieut. Colonel, USA, 7th Cavalry)

body.p: Nicholas County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Father of Julia B. Oden, M.E. Oden, E. E. Oden, G. M. Oden, N. U. Oden, and Bela H. Oden. Farmer in Nicholas County in 1860. Commissioned lieutenant colonel in the 7th Kentucky Volunteer Cavalry Regiment (U.S.A.) on August 16, 1862.

ab.bibl:
KYR-0001-020-1687.
Report of the Adjutant General of the State of Kentucky, vol. 1, 1861-1866 (Frankfort: Kentucky Yeoman Office, 1866), 180-181.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Nicholas County, Carlisle, p. 282.
